title: [Question] Top commentors please see this post...
content:
I want to change my clg and come to pes 
It even possible...
Please walk me through the process ..
I got a seat in nie but .
The campus sucks.
The staff suck.
The people and the atmosphere is soo gloomy I don't even want to go there ...
I couldn't get any branch in pes .
My rank was too low ..
Is there anyone who did change their clg ..
please help me guys..
Top commentors please see this thread

comments.body: I don't think so you can change it like that. I mean ig there's lateral entry but that's only for diploma students.. you can confirm it with PES management by calling the admission department. Other option remains taking a partial drop and trynna get a good KCET/Mains rank to end up here but I don't think so you should waste a drop year.. if you got North Campus in NIE then ig it should be fine if you're from CSE or related branches placements are decent I heard but if you're in some core branch you might be cooked

My clg mangement said u can apply for clg and branch change after first semester when vtu will announce the seat  vacancies later on (if there will be any) he mentioned smtg like u can only get into vtu affiliated clgs and govt aided ones 
So I think my best shot would be to hope for any vacancies in and outside my clg and hope it all works out ..Also.
Tq for ur time :)
It is vtu affiliated but they'll first let ppl from ec campus and their own campus to fill the vacancies ig ..so no real hope for me there
nah i’m 100% sure that PES isn’t affiliated to VTU. it a university

Ur right ..i just went through the entire list..
Looks like I've wasted ur time 
.
My bad .
No pes isnt vtu affiliated anymore don't even consider seat vacancies as an option
